thread.title: DW Reporting increase headcount to meet market demand
thread.title_full: DW Reporting increase headcount to meet market demand

author: DW Reporting
title: DW Reporting increase headcount to meet market demand
text:
Posted: 08 July 2015 
Share: Share on LinkedIn Share on Twitter Share on Facebook Email a link to this page Print this page 
DW Reporting, the leaders in software agnostic legal BI and data solutions, has today announced that Sam Elrazek, formally of Berwin Leighton Paisner and CMS Cameron McKenna has joined the firm as a Business Intelligence Consultant, boosting their consulting headcount. 
“We have seen significant growth in 2015, closing a record number of opportunities so demand for our services and solutions has required us to invest in additional permanent headcount. I am delighted that Sam has chosen to further his career with DW Reporting and, on behalf of the team, welcome him into the fold” said Dan Wales, managing director of DW Reporting. “Sam has that unique blend of in-house legal domain, finance systems and advanced reporting experience, which aligns seamlessly with our business and USP.” 
“The legal market is changing with high quality and real-time information becoming a ‘must-have’ requirement for law firms, regardless of their size. Data is a firm’s biggest asset and I believe that the DW Reporting team are now recognised as the market leaders in enabling data to be delivered in the form of coherent management information, seamlessly to end users.” said Sam Elrazek. “I am thrilled to be joining the highly skilled DW Reporting team at a time of exceptional growth and look forward to the exciting times ahead.” 
“We are experiencing a step change in the stature of our business and, as such, are actively recruiting for further positions to meet market demand, we hope that Sam’s arrival will be the first of many more in the months to come” continues Wales. 
Share:
